title: Home and Away fans devastated as soap confirms it will be taken off air for six weeks
text:

Home and Away viewers were gutted to hear that the Australian soap is going to go on a six week break.

Starting from Friday 22 November, the show will be off from UK screens on a lengthy Christmas break, and will return on Monday 6 January.

Home and Away is usually shown on weekdays at 1:15pm and 6pm on Channel 5.

As for the Aussie viewers, the show hasn't announced yet how long a break it will take in Australia.

But don't worry Australian soap fans, Neighbours will be running all the way through the Christmas period.

(Image: Channel 5)

(Image: Channel 5)

When the news broke on Twitter , viewers descended into a melt down with one fan replying with just crying face emojis.

"Noooooo!!!! they can't be off 6 weeks", exclaimed another.

"Not gd at all", added a third.

Another demanded: "The robbo story line better be solved before the break!!!!", referring to Robbo Shaw's wife Jasmine Delaney being kidnapped.

Channel 7 released a teaser on Tvtonight.com.au for what fans can expect in Home and Away when it returns.

It said: In 2020, the country’s No. 1 Australian drama will explore stories of love, romance, betrayal and psychological obsession.

We see the introduction of a new family which will inject an exciting dynamic to the stellar ensemble cast.

(Image: Channel 5)

And after a tragedy rocks the town, we will watch the community come together at the most unexpected wedding the Bay has ever seen to celebrate a precious second chance at love. "

Actress Olivia Deeble, who plays Raffy Morrison, recently revealed she is leaving the soap.

She posted a video to her Instagram where she announced: "After three years and almost 1000 episodes I completed my journey in the bay.

(Image: Channel 5)

"It was the most amazing experience of my life, I will be eternally grateful for all of my cast mates and crew.

"Thank you to all of you for the constant support and love".

She is moving on to star in Disney + movie Secret Society of Second Born Royals.
description: Home and Away will be taken off air for six weeks over Christmas, but the creators have hinted at an explosive 2020 for the show
